name: Gemstone Keeper
description: Gemstone Keeper is a twin stick shooter where avid explorers go down into the Cistershire Caverns, a large, dangerous and mysterious set of caves and caverns that are filled with vast amounts of rare and valuable gemstones.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 3800+ Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 6800 GT @ 512MB / ATI® Radeon™ X1900XT @ 512MB or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 27 MB available space
